channel.title: texture missing in the ventilation system
channel.description:
Found this texture missing/ hole in the ventilation system. [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ix0HBnss7c&feature=youtu.be']https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5ix0HBnss7c&feature=youtu.be[/url]
[Edit] map : bm_c1a1c at: -650 x, -2441 y, -1047 z setpos -650.946655 -2441.151611 -1047.968750;setang -4.715991 85.363480 0.000000

item.title: texture missing in the ventilation system
item.dc:creator: Krisayres
item.description:
They have done a good job by applying the texture in the final product, but wanted to know that does the black texture looking nice on it…??

https://www.selogerneuf.com/immobilier/bourgogne.htm

Read full topic

item.title: texture missing in the ventilation system
item.dc:creator: CrAzY
item.description:
You and me both! Good luck finding more.

Read full topic
item.source: texture missing in the ventilation system

item.title: texture missing in the ventilation system
item.dc:creator: AndyBay
item.description:
CrAzY:

It is not a hole as it would leak, and it is a texture. tools/nodraw.

You just like exploring is all. & with that level of exploring I am sure you will find another area with nodrawed brushes, just as you can in any official Half-life. Game designers can’t seal off every little area, y’know? & the more they try the more restrictive the final product feels. Although they could have just aimed the vent upwards and applied the tools/black texture to the top piece, but it really is unneeded for a spot only 1% (or less) of the players will go.

Well I would consider nodraw as a texture, therefore my title, and I do love exploring

Read full topic
item.source: texture missing in the ventilation system
